reference.title: Select Objects by Field
reference.shortdesc: Selects unique objects by the specified field (supports field nesting).

section.title: Motivation
section.p: Resolve the field value on a set of objects and retrieve that new set of objects.

strow.stentry: An arbitrary set of objects as input.
A dot notation to specify a field to select on the input objects.
